attributes.action: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
attributes.additional_details:
This would prevent reckless and dangerous use of them, and perhaps save lives.
It would ease animals and small children who spend each autumn/winter night petrified as bang after bang erupts in the night sky.
attributes.background: Fireworks, which are basically handheld explosive devices, should not be sold to the general public and only made available for organised events and displays with a permit to use them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
